author: alexp7
title: DWill - Cardanos Digital Testament
description: 数字资产的继承是越来越多的痛苦，而且非常难以管理。

f6_assessments.q0: 是的，该提案有效地解决了这个挑战。我真的很欣赏提案人发现的问题，因为在死亡或无行为能力的情况下，数字资产的转移可能会继续增长，并成为加密货币领域的一个严重问题。如果成功，这样一个平台（DID支持的遗嘱和遗言）可能会给社区带来巨大的好处，然而不太清楚的是这个项目具体会对更广泛的社区产生什么影响。是的，信息收集和分析是好的，但我希望看到以这种方式做这个项目有更好的理由。我不禁要问，在这个问题上，社会上还有什么其他类型的工作正在进行，而这个项目将如何加速DID的采用？从文字上看，该项目可能会探索DID在这样一个系统中的选择，但不一定会导致其采用，比如说如果出现某些法律问题。为此，是否有一个特定的司法管辖区被首先审查？不同的法律制度将如何解释？为了在影响方面得到满分，我希望看到有一节探讨/解释这些类型的考虑。
f6_assessments.q1: 是的，鉴于所提出的经验和计划，这个提案极有可能成功实施。我很欣赏提案人分享了他们的证书链接，以便选民们可以选择查看。提案人在Cardano社区内也有良好的成功记录，这增加了他们有能力交付项目的信心。然而，我有点困惑的是，为什么提议者没有加入已确定的用户体验研究员的证书，因为他已经在团队中，并将负责一半的工作。然而，对我来说，还缺少的是一个明确的时间表或路线图，说明这项工作将在何时完成。可交付的成果布置得很好，关键绩效指标似乎可以实现，但我不确定在什么时限内完成。如果从预算来看，这似乎只是一个2个月的项目，但对于所建议的内容来说，这可能是不够的。为了得到满分，我希望能看到这个时间表，以及在什么时间段内采取这些措施。预算是相当合理的，如果成功的话，可以用这么少的钱给社区带来红利，但由于上述原因，需要更多的细节来获得满分。
f6_assessments.q2: 从提案中不清楚如何对其进行适当的审计。虽然我很欣赏提案人在提案中提供的经验，但不清楚社区如何能够跟踪和参与提案人的工作。通过向 "志愿者 "开放调查，提议者可能会在本质上歪曲结果，因为那些志愿者往往是最有发言权的人，他们可能不会准确反映情况。用什么标准来选择这些人，一旦确定后如何审查他们，如果有的话，有什么保障措施来确保项目的准确性和清晰性？虽然关键绩效指标和可交付成果是明确的，但不太明显的是，提议者将如何把他们的发现反馈给社区，或利用社区的知识来帮助改善它。我给这个提案打3/5分（既不同意也不反对），因为需要更多的细节，以使投票者对这个项目有信心，可以适当地进行审计。如果这次基金不成功，在下一次提交的文件中增加这些内容，肯定会得到满分。

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal identifies the problem of finding real use cases for DIDs. They will ad value to the Cardano ecosystem by bringing more use cases to  DIDs, driving more transactions and users. The metrics of this proposal is on doing research and not necessarily aligned with the challenge, but the long term metrics of creating a digital testament/will that makes use of DIDs are aligned with the challenge. The end project will be able to scale as it is an existing model that is already used offchain.
f6_assessments.q1: Relevant skills for this proposal have been proved with LinkedIn page. The budget is reasonable and broken down into 2 items. UX and Lead researcher. They will complete their research in 2 months, which is very reasonable.  They explain in detail how they will do the research and break it down into different parts.  Also providing items that will be constructed with the research. They haven't considered any risks. Not being aware or prepared for risks, will slow you down.
f6_assessments.q2: They provided a project progress indicators section that indicates a roadmap with milestones and KPIs all in one. They also provided a list of deliverables when the research is complete. This will make measuring the progress and performance of the project very easy. They identify the need for creating Digital wills and they intend to solve this by first doing research on the topic to discover the best way to approach building this product.

f6_assessments.q0: `the subject (inheritance of digital assets) is ne that affects every crypto owner. So potential impact is as great as can be imagined. And even if only for ADA holders, that's already massive.
f6_assessments.q1: The plan is for research into a topic that is broad ranging. The background of the proposer, and his analysis of the domain suggests he can conduct the research .
f6_assessments.q2: the topic is huge, the domain of information is broad. The proposer has given tangible metrics by which to audit performance. Not too much to think about. And finally, the budget is quite reasonable.

f6_assessments.q0: Connecting smart contracts and wills to smart contracts is a great idea. If the proposal is implemented and developed to full potential, it will increase accelerate DID adoption and increase Cardano utility.
f6_assessments.q1: The team provided work history and experience with links to LinkedIn and the work previously done in the Cardano community. Considering the plan is not complicated to execute, I believe that the proposal will be implemented sucessfully.
f6_assessments.q2: The budget is small, simple and self-explanatory. The team created milestones and created KPIs to measure performance over time. I believe the proposal will be easy to audit.

solution: Cardano中的SmartContracts可以为Testaments的安全自动化提供基础，而Decentralized Identities可以实现这个用例。
experience: ATALA Prism第一组先锋。20年以上的数字产品和技术公司的建设。活跃的催化剂成员，CA，受资助的提案人。
